141.content:
Ivan Kirkland was someone who wanted a normal life, but was denied the chance to live it.

In a photo, Ivan looked like an ordinary 20 year old. Short brown hair, brown coat, and black trousers. However, in person his oddities shined thourgh. Most noticeably that he was only an inch tall.

Now for some background. Ivan was once a 5’7 guy living by himself with no family. The one person he had in his life was his best friend Winston. The 6’5 man was always available for help and moral support, and became like a brother to Ivan. Unfortunately, this brotherhood came to an end when Winston was killed by a mugger.

Ivan became like a zombie, feeling despaired at the loss of his friend. He wanted to bring his friend back, and he believed he found a way. Ivan’s father had studied alchemy in the past and after he passed away, Ivan was left with all his notes. One picture caught his eye along with it’s description, claiming that he could bring somebody back to life.

Having believed he found a way to see his friend again, he followed the instructions to perform the human transmutation. As the circle glowed, Ivan grew hopeful he would see his friend again. However that wasn’t the case as the energy grew out of control and Ivan found himself blacking out. Waking up, he saw a large door behind him and a hunched over luminous figure. The figure looked up at Ivan with what he could only describe as the biggest grin ever. Ivan began to feel lightheaded and before he blacked out again,he could of sworn the smile began to fill his sky.

Waking up, Ivan immediately noticed the problem, he was one inch tall naked in his former clothes. Over the next couple of days he was able to get by, as he discovered he could now perform alchemy freely without a circle. This allowed him to make new clothes and get around his gigantic apartment.

A week passed, his life faced another change. While sitting on his floor he heard his door open. He remembered he hadn’t locked the door as few people bothered him. He soon felt booming footsteps make way to the room he was in and was greeted by a military giant. The giant had black hair and a pair of gloves with alchemy symbols. As the giant continued his advance, Ivan faced a problem. He was in the giant’s path.

This started a two minute challenge of Ivan trying to get the giant’s attention, all the while having to dive out the way of his boot. The giant didn’t take notice and simply investigated the apartment, unaware of the man he almost kept crushing. Eventually Ivan got the idea in the form of a dust ball. Approaching the dust, he clapped his hands creating a familiar glow. This caught the eye of the giant who came towards the light squinting and widening his eyes at the sight of the tiny human.

Ivan watched in anticipation as the giant got on his knees and leaned forward towards him,

“Um, hello I am Colonel Mustang, and I’ve come here for Evan Kirkland.”

“Well uhhh, I’m Ivan Kirkland. And I’m sorry to say but Evan Kirkland isn’t here anymore.”

And with that awkward introduction, Ivan was thrown into his new life. Albeit hesitantly, Colonel Mustang carried him back to his office. After he was looked at, it was decided he would be a ward of the military and under it’s “protection”. Well more like under the Colonel’s protection. The man who Ivan now called Roy often had him sit on his desk, though he was kind his flirtatious attitude did get old sometimes. Luckily Lieutenant Hawkeye limited his behavior.

Some other people Ivan came to known were the Elric brothers. Both having gone through a similar experience, were sympathetic and became friends. Though both were different. Edward seem to display childish glee that there was someone not only older but smaller then him. Alphonse was very kind and often apologized for his brother”s outbursts.

Major Armstrong was another person he became associated with. The already giant sparklingly man was very kind to Ivan. Almost to a fault however, as his hugs were both comforting and made him feel like he was about to pop being squeezed between his pecs. It didn’t help that he often wanted Ivan to join him for workouts.

Now Ivan sat on Roy’s desk as he grumbled over his paper work, he simply read a page of the book Edward lend. After an hour he had only read five pages due to his size.

Still this day would have more for Ivan as........
141.title: Fullmetal Alchemist

1411.content:
Suddenly the door opened, and Edward and Alphonse walked in. Edward was in his black tank top, showing off his muscles, while Al was also in a tank top.

"Hey Ivan!" Al greeted the tiny male

"What's up shorty?" Ed teased Ivan as he scooped him up in his hand.

"Don't call him that, brother!" Al scolded Ed.

"Oh come on, I'm just messing with the little guy." Ed grinned mischievously

"I was in the middle of reading, now I lost my place." Ivan sighed.

"Whoops, sorry" Ed chuckled "Al and I just got done working out, thought we'd drop in."

"Gross, I can smell you from here." Ivan pinched his nose.

Ed smirked and hopped into Roy's chair with Ivan still in his hand.

"Ahhh, maybe one day I'll be sitting in this chair." Ed smirked.

Ivan chuckled a bit, before he was dropped by Ed, Ivan landed inside of Ed's tank top in between his massive pecs, sinking into the hot muscles. Ed sighed and rested his arms behind his head and put his feet up on the desk.
1411.title: Edward and Alphonse came in

choices: Ed takes his boots off to unleash the foot cheese!
14112.content:
The door to the office opened and Roy Mustang walked in to see Ed with his feet up on his desk and his sweaty armpits on full display. Mustang's eye twitched, "Fullmetal...what do you think you're doing?!" Roy demanded. His response was a cheeky grin from the young alchemist who defeated Father not too long ago.

"What's it look like? Relaxing!" Ed waved his boot clad feet back and forth tauntingly.

"Um...we're here to pick up Ivan, Colonel Mustang." Al said, trying to diffuse the situation before it got worse. Roy seemed to calm down and sigh, "I see, Ivan...wait...where is he?" Mustang looked around.

Ivan peeked out from Ed's tank top, visibly wet and pinching his nose closed. "R-right here!"

Ed sniggered and patted Ivan on the head with his index finger, "See? Safe and sound and ready for the trip!"

"Trip? What trip?" Ivan asked curiously. "Well...we wanted it to be a surprise...but you're coming to stay with us instead of being stuck under the military's protection all the time!" Al said kindly.

Ivan's eyes widened, "R-really? You guys will....take me in and I won't be a...bother?"

Ed nodded, his face a kinder, more genuine expression now. "Yeah, you won't take up that much space! Besides, I can be a giant to you all the time now!" Ed chuckled, Ivan sighed...some things never change.

"T-thank you...this means so much." Ivan wiped a few tears from his eyes.

Soon after this, Ed and Alphonse went back to their hotel room.

Al went out to pick up some food to bring back, so that left Ivan and Edward in the room alone.

Ed still was wearing his sweat stained tank top and boots as well that he'd had on all this time. "H-hey um...Ed?" Ivan gently asked, he was sitting on Ed's abdomen as the boy was relaxed with his hands folded behind his head on the bed.

"Hm? Something on your mind, little guy?" Ed opened an eye to look down at Ivan.

"Um....I just wanted to say...thank you. I know you like the idea of being so much bigger than me...and I was wondering if I could help you have fun in any way?" Ivan blushed.

"What do you mean?" Ed was intrigued.

"Well...you being a giant....and me being tiny....I could make you feel good...like tell you how big you are and stuff as you enjoy being HUGE and having power over me?" Ivan said quietly.
14112.title: Roy walked in.

142.content:
Chiba Nidai was a small, lean sixteen year old. Looking at him most would assume he was into extracurricular activities such as art or literature. However he was actually into sports, basketball specifically.

He attended Teikõ Junior High, the school known for creating the legendary basketball team the Generation of Miracles. Chiba was actually friends with them, although he didn't play on the team, he showed up at the games and would visit at the end of practice. He was remembered as the kind small friend that could put a smile on their faces. However as they won more and increased their skill, the team grew further apart in their friendship. Eventually at the end of junior high, he was asked which high school he was attending by the team. All he could do was shake his head as tears fell from his eyes and run from the voices of his former friends.

Now he attended Seirin High, while the team went to different schools. Although he thought he could feel a familar presence when he walked by the gym, he avoided going in. Feeling it would bring up bad memories.

Sitting under a tree he began to doze off, wishing he could be with his friends again.

_____________________________________________________________

Opening his eyes, Chiba felt different. He was laying down and th ground felt much more comfy and soft. However looking around, He gasped in shock he wasn't in front of the school he was in a giant bedroom!

He had little time to process the situation the door to the bedroom opened and the giant inhabitant walked in. Chiba panicked slightly, but upon seeing the giant he could only gaze in shock as tears began to fill his eyes.

The giant walking in was his old friend....
142.title: Kuroko No Basket

choices: Looked at him with a smirk
1421.content:
The tanned skin and blue hair. Chiba immediately recognized the giant as the power-forward Aomine Daiki.

Back in junior high, Chiba would peek through the doors to watch the team play. Near the end of practice, he was spotted by Daiki. Just as he ran away he was called back by the bluenette, asking if he wanted to watch them. Taking the invitation, Chiba watched a practice match and was introduced to everyone later.

Daiki always wanted Chiba to play with him and he always got declined as the short boy didn't want to lose within a matter of minutes. Still he stood by him and they became like brothers. Which only made it harder when Daiki became too skilled and less passionate about his games.

Now Daiki stood before Chiba again as a giant. Daiki made his way over to his bed and the spot Chiba was sitting at. He took note of the unbuttoned top of his shirt, allowing a view of his strong chest causing him to blush. As he got closer, Chiba began to wave his arms in an attempt to be seen.

It seem to work as Daiki brought his blue eyes down to his shrunken friend.

Daiki then.........
1421.title: Aomine Daiki

1422.content:
Through the door came an extremely tall, purple haired boy. He had a tired look on his face and still had his uniform on. His left arm was carrying an assortment of snacks. It was Atsushi Murasakibara, the purple giant.

When Chiba hung out with the team he used to bring them homemade snacks, Atsushi has been excited whenever he made treats and became close to Chiba. It seem like a opposite attract situation, despite their height difference they were close. Atsushi would rub his head and carry him on shoulders.

Still, near the end of junior high, Atsushi began to keep his distance from Chiba saying he didn't want to "crush" him. Chiba watched his skill and understood, he didn't want to accidentally hurt him and other players with his strength.

Atsushi walked over to his bed, snacks in hand. As he approached, Chiba gazed up in awe as his friend loomed over him like a titan. He knew he needed to get the giant's attention.

Chiba began to wave his arms and call out. "Atsushi! Down here!"

After his yelling he saw Atsushi....
1422.title: Atsushi Murasakibara

14221.content:
Atsushi had been prepared to relax and munch on his favorite snacks. As he approached his bed, he heard his name being squeeked and it sounded awfully familiar. Looking down at his bed he saw a speck waving at him. Gazing closer, he saw it not only reassembled a human but it looked like his old friend Chiba!

Widening his eyes and dropping his snacks, Atsushi croched down making his head leveled with the covers. "Chi-chin?", he asked shocked.

Chiba approached the purple giant, trying to keep his tears in. "Yea....It's me Atsushi."

However as Chiba approached the face, Atsushi suddenly scooted away. "Atsushi?"

"Chi-chin, I'm dangerous enough normally. But your small I could do worse.", Atsushi explained but suddenly he noticed Chiba sniffing and holding his arms out.

"Atsushi please! I just want to be with my friends! You aren't a giant monster, you're the big friend that defended me from bullies and patted my head. Please don't avoid me again!", Chiba finally broke down, falling to his knees and crying into his hands.

Atsushi stared stumped. He thought of all the nice memories he had with Chiba. All the times the boy gave him sweets and rode on his back. But as he got more skilled, he was plagued by bad thoughts. He didn't want his power to hurt Chiba.

It didn't help that he got nightmares.
°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°
(Nightmare)

Atsushi stood dressed in his Yõsen basketball uniform. In front of his shoe stood a small speck. Chiba was smaller only 1 cm tall. He called up to Atsushi who stretched into the heavens.

Atsushi looked down, but Chiba was struck with fear. The purple giant was smirking down at him. He suddenly spoke.

"I'll crush you".

Atsushi brought up his foot and Chiba could only watch in horror as the sole was brought down on him.
°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°°
Atsushi shuttered, remembering that dream made him want to always check the bottom of his shoes.

Still looking at his crying friend Atsushi decided to put aside those thoughts. Scooting over to Chiba, Atsushi gently used a finger to rub the tiny's Back, causing him to look up.

Smiling Atsushi spoke. "Chi-chin I won't leave you. I'll be as careful as I can, so stop crying. I like you more with a smile."

Chiba nodded before wipping his eyes and smiling. "Ok."

Atsushi then decided to......
14221.title: Look Down at Him

142211.content:
After Chiba calmed down, Atsushi picked his snacks back up from the floor. The tiny boy watched in awe as the purple giant carefully crawled onto his bed, lying on his side so he could face Chiba. Atsushi opened up a bag of chips before popping one in his mouth. He then held one out to Chiba, and to him it was the size of a small table.

"Chi-chin likes pepper flavored right?"

Nodding, Chiba took the chip with a thank you. Although unlike Atsushi who eat a new chip every few seconds, Chiba was nibbling on the spicy chip for a minute and only a small bit was gone. The giant giggled at the tiny's struggle.

"I'm happy you're back Chi-chin", Atsushi said with a soft gaze.

"Atsushi.....why did you go away?"

The giant sighed before bringing up a hand. "Chi-chin...i got stronger. You saw what I could do, i didn't want you to get hurt too.", Atsushi finished clenching his hand.

With the power he had on the court, he was afraid of hurting others with it. He stopped hanging around Chiba when he had thoughts of him getting hurt. Even more with his dreams making him snuff the boy out like a bug.

"Atsushi...can you pick me up?", Chiba suddenly asked.

Atsushi was surprised, and hesitantly nodded and placed his palm in front of Chiba. Climbing onto the palm, Chiba was about the size of a pea. As he stood on the soft flesh, the tiny gestured Atsushi to bring him to his face. The palm rose to Atsushi's eyes and Chiba was captivated by thier brightness.

Smiling at his giant friend, Chiba walked to the edge of the palm and embraced Atsushi's nose. The purplenette was surprised to say the least.

"It's ok Atsushi, your strong but...i know you'd never hurt me. I know you as the big guy who was sweet and nice to me", Chiba ended with a small peck to the nose.

Atsushi smiled at his friend as he place him back on the bed.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
After some time of chatting and snacking, Atsushi needed to go to bed for school. He said they would figure something out in the morning.

Chiba's face soon turned red as Atsushi nonchalantly began to change into his PJ's, showing off his muscled body.

The giant then laid down, before gently picking up Chiba and laying him in the center of his chest. The tiny felt himself put at ease from the warmth and heartbeat below him.

The both of them soon fell asleep and.....
142211.title: Relax with Chiba

1422112.content:
Opening his eyes, Chiba found himself in some black void. Strangely he felt another presence.

"Nidai-kun?"

The teen jumped at the sudden voice out of nowhere. Looking behind, Chiba found a familar boy with light blue hair.

"K-kuroko?"

Nodding his head Kuroko looked at Chiba with confusion. "Why are we here?"

Before Chiba could respond, the two of them let the ground begin to shake. Looking behind them, the boys watched in awe as two familiar titans filled thier sky. Atsushi wasn't alone this time, next to him was a tanned bluenette also known as Aomine Daiki.

The two giants looked down at the specks in front of thier basketball shoes. Atsushi had a bored look, while Daiki gave a cocky smirk.

"Heh you weren't kidding Atsushi! They do look like bugs.", Daiki laughed as he squatted down to get a better look.

"Yeah I know, I almost crushed them.", Atsushi nonchalantly said as he picked his ear.

"Alright then, I get Kuroko and you get Chiba!"

As he said this Daiki reached down and plucked Kuroko up by his collar. Rather then fear, the shadow seem to have a excited glint in his eye. Daiki placed Kuroko in his palm before walking off, beginning to tug at his waistband and smirk more.

Looking up, Chiba saw the palm of Atsushi approaching before scooping him up. The giant gave a tired grin.

"Hmm I have Chi-chin all to myself."

Walking over to a couch seemingly out of nowhere, Chiba looked up in fear at the giant.

"At-sushi what are you going to do?"

Atsushi seem to grin more as he.......
1422112.title: Had a nightmare

choices: He begins to have a dream
143.content:
The world this story takes place in is slightly different then that of our own. For starters, there existed a species similar to humans. The species however had one distinct feature, they only grew to a inch and a half tall.

This new species appeared around the end of the 20th century. At the time only a few have been discovered, however after being shown to be intelligent creatures more appeared and came to a population of 500,000. With this new species joining humanity, changes were made so they could exist peacefully. There were very few cases of crime targeting the species which were called “Tines”. Still for most schools and clubs, humans and tines had to be in separate groups to ensure safety.
—————————————————————————â €”——
A tiny twelve year old boy sat on one of the window ledges surrounding the big body of water in front of him. The boy and his father had come to the Iwatobi Swimming club, hoping to join a swim team. He was devastated when he learned there wasn’t a tiny team. The blond couch attempted to cheer him up, saying he could start up a tiny team next year.

The boy in question was named Tai Yamazaki. Despite being a tiny, he lived with a family of humans. It didn’t matter as both his parents loved him, and his brother would help him swim in the sink and bath. His brother was however slightly overprotective. He had felt drawn to the water since he took his first bath and wanted to be able to join a team that shared his passion. But it seems he would have to wait.

Tai’s father had gotten a call and decided to let his son explore the pool area as he went outside to talk. Right away Tai noticed the lack of tiny aid tools, and his experience didn’t get better when the blond couch walked in and nearly squished Tai under his foot. Noticing the tiny, the couch apologized profusely and set him on a windowsill to watch his team.

“Hello, are you new here?

Tai was brought out of his thoughts by an unfamiliar voice. Looking up he saw a boy looming over him, with brown hair, green eyes, and looked to be the same age as him. Tai was always shy around unfamiliar people, so his response was a little awkward. “I-um, came t..to join the swim twin. But there..wasn’t a tiny team.”

The green eyed boy frowned before glancing away and looking back with a smile. “We just finished up practice, do you want to take a dip in the pool?”

Tai looked surprised at the offer. “B-but I might get in the way of someone. Also I haven’t swam in water that deep”, the boy rambled while the giant just shook his head and placed his palm in front of Tai. “It’s ok, I can help you out. Everyone should be able to swim.”

Taking a breath, Tai nodded before walking onto the bus sized palm. Sitting down he felt the soft ground and looked up as the giant lifted his hand up. “I’m...uh Tai Yamazaki”

The giant smiled. “It’s nice to meet you Yamazaki-Kun. My name is Tachibana Makoto.”

“Nice t-to meet you Tachibana-Kun”

Makoto gently dipped Tai into the water, making sure to check that he wasn’t sinking at any point. Tai had the time of his life, feeling like he was in a ocean. After a few minutes, Makoto picked Tai up in his cupped palms and smiled at the happy look on the Tiny’s face. Tai soon got to meet Makoto’s teammates, this time he was less awkward. The boy called Nagisa excitingly greeted him, saying how adorable he looked. Haruka gave a mere nod in greeting, which was better then nothing. And then there was the maroon haired Rin, he seem really friendly but his sharp smile sent chills down Tai’s spine. Lastly, the tiny formally met the couch Goro. Who apologized again for nearly smushing him.

Despite saying goodbye, it wasn’t the last Tai saw of the boys. He made sure to show up for the races and always congratulate them. Despite not swimming, Tai and the team grew close and had fun together. From building Tai a sandcastle to Rin acting as his own personal cruise ship.

However the good times soon came to end. Tai himself didn’t know the full details, but as they entered junior high the group separated. Tai stayed in touched with Makoto and Haru and still hung out. Still, Tai hoped one day they could rekindle.
———————————————————————

Tai woke up rubbing his eyes. He got up from his bed that sat on his brother’s nightstand, he frowned looking at the empty giant bed. While Tai decided to attend Iwatobi high school, his brother was off to Samezuka academy. He looked at a large photo next to him, it was Tai sitting on his brother’s head smiling while the giant looked up annoyed.

Getting dressed, Tai made his way to the front porch and waited...

Tai began to feel tremors from the ground, but he remained unfazed. He still didn’t react even when two giant orange shoes began coming towards him, carrying a true titan with them. Tai remained calm despite the ground shaking and watching one of the shoes crush a weed growing from the sidewalk. Finally the two feet stopped in front of Tai, and looking up he didn’t see the sole of the shoe but rather a familiar smile.

“Good morning Tai-Kun!”

Good morning Makoto!”

Makoto bend over, before scooping up Tai into his palm and lifting him up to his shoulder. Sitting on the giant’s shoulder, Tai felt like he had a bird’s eye view from his seat as makoto continued his tread.

Making their way to Haruka’s, the two boy chatted up talking about the school year. Tai wasn’t sure how but he ended up nuzzling into Makoto’s warm neck. The giant twitched in surprise but attempted not to move to disrupt his friend.

Arriving at Haru’s, he wouldn’t open the door. So Makoto and Tai made their way inside and sure enough there Haru layed in his bathtub. “Haru, come on we have to go to school,”

Sighing, Haru stood up before his attention fell on Tai. “Hmm. Tai-Kun do you want to join me?”

“Umhhu....maybe later!”, Tai stammered trying to hide his blush.
————————————————————

As they arrived at school, Tai had to be dropped off at his tiny classroom. He was placed on the ground, watching as his friends loomed over him and said goodbye the boys walked away, their booming footsteps decreasing.

As he sat in class, Tai couldn’t help but think of his friends. Makoto was like a Titan who could crush you in one step. And Haru looked like he would have no problem squishing someone. He could imagine both raising their soles over him and engulfing him in foot flesh.

Classes soon ended for the day. Just as Tai began to leave.......
143.title: Free! Iwatobi Swim Club

1432.content:
As he walked out to the hallway, Tai felt his phone begin to vibrate. Looking at the screen, he grinned at seeing the caller ID read Sousuke.

"Hey Nii-San!"

"Hey Tai."

The tiny heard a deep voice respond to him. Tai's brother was named Sousuke Yamazaki, and he wasn't just a big brother because of his age. He had been Tai's best supporter when it came to swimming, though he had been reluctant when they were younger.

Standing in the hall, Tai took notice of the booming footsteps of the humans walking by and decided to make his way outside using the tiny walkway.

Arriving outside, Tai began a long conversation with Sousuke. Telling him about his first day, asking him about Samezuka, and gushing over the pool in a picture his brother sent him.

"Sign ups for clubs are tommarow, I was wondering if you wanted to hang out tonight?", Sousuke asked over the phone. "Huh? Are you sure that's ok?"

"Yeah I have enough time before curfew, I'll be waiting at the gate to pick you up."

And so when they ended their phone call, Tai texted Makoto to tell him to go home without him. Although confused, Makoto eventually agreed telling him to be careful.

Walking out to the almost empty front gate, Tai saw a tall brown haired human standing in a Samezuka uniform. As the giant spotted the tiny, he smiled before crouching down and placing his palm on the ground in front of Tai.

Tai wasted no time in running onto the soft surface and embracing the thumb. Sousuke smiled down at his brother, rubbing the top of his head with a finger. Standing up he began to walk away from the school, holding Tai close to his strong chest.

"So...where are we going?", Tai asked his brother.

Sousuke grinned as he replied.

"I figured we go......
1432.title: His brother calls him

144.content:
Ralph signed laying down on his bed. His fist day of senior year didn’t go the way he would have preferred it to.

While others were pumped and excited over starting their last year of high school, Ralph wanted it to end as soon as it started. This year of school just didn’t ring with him. His best and only friend had moved over the summer, meaning Ralph needed to find someone else who shared his interest.

Ralph was into games and anime, something he and his best friend Justin bonded over. They spent their middle and high school years watching their favorite anime Yu-Gi-Oh! together and playing the game.
They both loved watching Yugi’s duels and the connections he made with his friends. It in turn helped bind their friendship. But still all good things had to come to an end. Justin’s parents got a job in Australia, limiting their friendship to only calls and texts.

Ralph opened up his laptop and logged into his Crunchyroll account. Looking up his favorite anime he saw all the other series,” Hmm, I’ve only watched a little of GX.” He lost his train of thought when he suddenly yawned.

“I’ll catch up on them this weekend. Maybe Justin..seen...themm......”

Ralph’s eyes closed causing him to drift to sleep. What he didn’t notice was the laptop screen beginning to glow.

The series displayed on the screen was

1451.content: Now before we advance, first pick a school the story is set in. This will reflect the tiny character's personality.
1451.title: Haikyuu!

14511.content:
Ryan Saito was someone who liked to acknowledge his own quirks. These differences included the birthmark on his shoulder, his part European ethnicity, and the fact that he was only an inch tall.

Ryan’s life was one shrouded in mystery, the source of his small stature couldn’t be determined as both his parents were average in height and had no recall of any strange happenings before his birth. The stress of taking care of a child is one thing, but Ryan had to be constantly watched to prevent him from getting into danger. Eventually the stress drove both of his parents apart, and Ryan’s father was left to take care of him alone.

Looking for a change to better their life’s, Ryan’s father Akio moved them back to his home in Miyagi when Ryan was six years old. Coming back to his homeland, Akio reconnected with his old friend Hinata Hikari. Meeting for the first time in a while they brought their kids with them. However, Ryan was extremely shy as he had not interacted with any kids his age before. Despite this, meeting and befriending Hinata Shōyō was one of the best things in his life.

The young ball of sunshine looked in awe at the tiny boy his age, sitting in his father’s cupped palms. Assuring Akio he would take care of his son, Hinata held his hands out still as if made of stone, when Akio placed Ryan into the smaller palms. While the parents talked, Hinata tried to talk to Ryan. Keyword “tried”.

“So What you like to do!?”

“......”

“Is this your first time in japan?”

“......”

“Ryan. That name sounds so cool!”

“......”

“Hey, are you ok?”

Ryan brought his gaze up from the peach colored hand holding him to the concerned face of Hinata. “Aren’t you.....weirded out by my size?”, he timidity asked. Hinata’s face morphed into confusion and Ryan brought his head down preparing for the worst.

“Why would I?”

Looking up in surprise, Ryan found Hinata brightly smiling down at him. “I think it’s cool! I’ve never met someone like you, I think your size makes you unique!”

Ryan for the first time in a while, smiled in happiness.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The friendship between Ryan and Shōyō stuck all the way to high school. There wasn’t a day when Shōyō’s happiness wasn’t contagious. Despite his high energy, Shōyō was always careful and gentle whenever he carried or hung around Ryan. Shōyō expressed his interest in volleyball and desire to join a team and while Ryan couldn’t help Shōyō prepare properly, he could help him in his own way. This included making a net from sticks and a leave, and Ryan passing a ball of string for Shōyō’s finger to serve.

They had fun doing this sort of game, even if Shōyō kept accidentally smashing the net.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Low and behold, Shōyō made the volleyball team and Ryan was happy for his friend. However, with this achievement came a problem. Shōyō had always brought Ryan home, and had he not been an inch tall he may have been able to go alone. It didn’t help that Akio’s job went a few hours over the school schedule, and Ryan had to wait in the office the whole time intill his father arrived.

Unknown to Ryan, Shōyō had stressed the issue to his captain asking if he could help in any way. Eventually a solution was reached and Ryan was surprised when Shoyo told him he could stay with him at practice!

And so Ryan sat in Shōyō’s palm as he entered the gym, though he covered the tiny with his other hand as he was nervous of how his team would react. He didn’t exactly explain the full details of Ryan’s situation, most notably that he was so small.

“Oh Hinata you’re here!”

“Ah! Yeah!”

A teen with a large built approached Shōyō, and Ryan could feel the hand holding him begin to tremble nervously.

“So when is your friend going to arrive?”

“He...is already...here.”

The teen looked confused at Shōyō’s answer. Before he could question him further, Shōyō uncovered his hand and held up Ryan for his captain to see.

Ryan blinked, adjusting to the change in lighting. Looking up he saw the shocked face of Shōyō’s captain staring down at him. Attempting to ease the tension, Ryan stood up and bowed. “Hello my name is Ry-Saito Ryan”, he internally cured at his improper introduction. “Thank you for allowing me to stay.”

“Oh yeah, no problem”, the captain began to bring his hand down for Ryan to shake but quickly pointed his finger instead. “I’m the team captain Sawamura Daichi and no problem, Hinata talks about you a lot”, Ryan shook Daichi’s finger and the both of them soon smiled.

After their meeting, Daichi called over the team to introduce Ryan. Upon meeting them, he received mixed reactions. One bald guy and black and blond guy dramatically yelled, a grey haired boy looked in curiosity, and a blond boy with glasses stared uninterested.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The practice went on without any incidents, minus a stray ball hitting the bleachers near Ryan and Shōyō full of panic yelling if he was alright.

Ryan continued staying after school and enjoyed watching the team practice and do matches. Over time he got to know the other boys, and developed certain relationships with them.


Daichi - The captain always ensured Ryan was safe whenever they practiced and like Shōyō seem to fret even if the smallest thing happened. If he was every teased by other students Daichi would appear behind Ryan like a wrathful titan to terrify the bullies. He also got a text from Ryan one night showing him sitting on a volleyball, saying “Don’t worry Shōyō’s with me.”. It left a sweet feeling in his stomach.

choices: You Give Up Your Employers....But Kurapika isn't just Going to Let You Go!
1453323332212.content:
https://i.imgur.com/0bBgPxm.jpg

Your name was Taiteo Korba and you were a hired spy for the Phantom Troupe. Unfortunately for you that meant you were disposable to the group...so if something were to go wrong you couldn't count on them to save your hide.

Your special Nen was what gave you an edge in your surveillance mission. You were able to decrease your size for extended periods of time, but the drawback was that once you shrank down..you were stuck like that for a period of two weeks.

Thankfully you were an expert at hiding and avoiding detection...you were also quite durable but could also feel pain. You had been ordered to spy on the last surviving member of the Kurta clan who was after the Troupe.

However, things took a bad turn when you were suddenly enveloped in chains and dangled before the now scarlet eyes of the blond boy.

"Who are you?!" Kurapika demanded, his voice a low boom to your ears.

You didn't answer, you knew better than to sell out the Phantom Troupe...buut it's not like you wanted to die.

The chains tightened, constricting around your body and choking you of air. "I asked you a question! Who. are. YOU?" The Kurta boy's booming voice demanded fiercely.

"Can't...tell...you..." You grunted. The scarlet eyes narrowed menacingly, Kurapika had a feeling whoever you were...you were connected to his search for revenge against the Phantom Troupe.
1453323332212.title: Kurapika

choices: Kurapika begins to slowly crush you with stomps
14533233322121.content:
The menacing scarlet eyes burned into your very being as Kurapika looked at you with rage.

"I can and will kill you if you don't answer my question! Tell me, do you know of the Phantom Troupe?"

You kept your mouth shut as the chain constricted your body and felt as if you were being constricted. Kurapika seem to get his answer by your silence. Suddenly the chain loosened and you panted in painless breaths. You were still stuck and soon found yourself being settled on the ground.

This was too good to be true, Kurapika wouldn't just let you go. Looking up at the intimating looming figure, the blond was still looking down at you from his killer eyes. Suddenly he lifted up his foot and his face was covered by the dark sole. The giant shoe slowly started lowering.

"H-he's gonna crush me!", you closed your eyes as you expected to get stomped into the ground.

However, a weight settled beneath your knees. Opening your eyes you saw Kurapika had placed the tip of his shoe on your legs.

"Now tell me where the Phantom troupe is! If you don't I'll ensure you can't escape me!", Kurapika said with venom in his voice.

You picked up what he meant and was filled with fear. If you ratted out the Troupe then the Kurta may spare you. But you would spend two weeks tiny where you would probably hunted down for snitching.

The silence was enough to confirm your answer as Kurapika lifted his heel and began adding pressure to the toes. You began panicking as you felt pressure to you leg.

"W-wai-!"

CRACK

You yelled out in agony as your bones were shattered under Kurapika's unmerciful foot. The foot soon lifted to reveal your mangled leg, Kurapika then stepped forward and pinned your body below the neck under his shoe.

"Your stubbornness will lead to your death, I will be the one to kill you and I'll make it like that of stamping out a ant. I'll break your body intill you wish for death!", Kurapika narrowed his eyes as he saw you pathetically squirming beneath his foot.

Soon....
14533233322121.title: Kurapika Tortures You

145332333221213.content:
"Okay okay! Please, I'll tell you! Then you'll let me go right?!" You wailed, you never were one for direct confrontation..much less having experience with pain such as this.

Kurapika didn't answer, and merely kept his foot in position on you. "Talk." He said with a scowl. You paled and whimpered, this kid meant business. You yelped and were jerked out of your silence by Kurapika putting pressure on you once more.

"Alright alright! The Phantom Troupe hired me to spy on you! Okay?! We good? GAAH!" You yelled out as Kurapika lifted his foot and slammed it down directly next to you.

"So you're NOT with the Phantom Troupe..." Kurapika's eyes began to fade back to normal...that was a good sign!

"I-I'm just a freelancer! They approached me and wanted me to spy on you! That's it! I'm not even a member!" You wailed through the pain in your leg...hoping he'd buy that you weren't exclusive to them.

Kurapika narrowed his eyes, they were less unsettling now that they weren't completely red..but he was still intimidating.

"I don't believe you, the Phantom Troupe is very secretive..I've studied them for a long time...you MUST have some connection to them. And if that's the case, then I can use YOU to lead me to them." Kurapika gained a disturbing smirk on his face. You gulped, "W-wait...what about me?! You fucked up my leg! How am I gonna 'lead' you anywhere!?"

"Oh I'm sure you'll be willing....instead of becoming a stain." Kurapika chuckled darkly. "But in the meantime...I could use you for some stress relief."
145332333221213.title: Fessing Up...But will it Help? Probably Not

1453323332212131.content:
You were struck with fear at that, the blond giant was gonna use you as some sort of toy and he wasn't bound to go gentle.

Kurapika began shifting his feet, soon from the slipper like shoe came a large pale foot. Your nose soon tingled as a stench soon hit your nose, like that of vinegary sweat and heated musk. The giant sole soon loomed over you, casting you in a shadow.

You took in Kurapika long sole, it was muscled and firm which was expected from how much he moves on his feet. There were visible drops of murky sweat all over the sole, sending their salty musk.

A smirk was definitely on the boy's face as although the foot covered his face, the large toes flexed and wiggled.

"I think I should show you what happens to all the bugs I find trembling before me. Don't move!", Kurapika ordered as he smirked.

You obeyed out of fear that another body part would get snapped. Holding in your coughs as the heavy stench got thicker with the sole descending.

The large foot then completely stepped on you, Kurapika grinned darkly as he applied just a bit of pressure to invoke fear in you.

"I'm not even putting my full weight down, If you were a ordinary ant you would be a corpse beneath me."

You coughed into the sweaty sole as the firm sole began smooshing both its tinge of chessy salt stench and Kurapika's weight onto you.

"Now I'll remove my foot-" , you began to grow hopeful. "So that you can do your first task.", only for it to be crushed.

Kurapika put his foot on his heel so that it still loomed over you and arched its firm sole. The blond boy looked down with a cruel gaze.

"I want my feet to not hurt so much, a rub should do so.", the dimmed scarlet looked directly at you in the shadow of his sole. "There is always time to crush you so start rubbing!

With no choice you reached forward and pressed your palms to the tough sole. The sweaty skin soon lost some tension as you rubbed into the large heel.

Kurapika watched your rubbing somewhat amused, both at the tiny hands on his sole and the foot looming over.

"Don't stop rubbing, I want to use you fully before I eventually crush you!"

Soon....
1453323332212131.title: Kurapika's Stress Relief

14533233322121311.content:
Fearing for your life you kept rubbing Kurapika's heel, kneading the calloused flesh as hard as you could. Holding your breath to inhale as little of the funk emanating from his feet as you could. Keeping his foot looming above you Kurapika sat down, a smug grin spreading across his face as he enjoyed feeling your tiny hands pressing into his sweaty sole. The massage continued in this position until he was tired of you only rubbing his heel.

"You've massaged there enough! Rub higher." he ordered, banging his heel on the floor for emphasis.

"Higher? You broke my leg!" you shouted incredulously, gesturing towards the shattered limb.

Kurapika looked down at you for a moment, his expression aloof, before lowering his foot onto you.

"If you can't be a masseuse..." he pressed his foot hard against your body "...you'll be a massage stick." with that he started rolling your body between his musky sole and the ground. The pressure was like nothing you'd ever experienced. You were sure that you would pop at any minute as Kurapika used you to thoroughly massage every salty sweaty inch of his foot. But you stayed intact as the rolling motion compressed your lungs, repeatedly emptying and filling them with the sharp vinegary air of his feet. It was like getting CPR from a wheel of cheese!

And through it all Kurapika carefully monitored his strength to get as deep a massage out of you as he could without breaking you.
14533233322121311.title: More foot rubbing

choices: "If you can't be a masseuse, you'll be an insole."
145332333221213111.content:
Until he didn't.

A momentary lapse in concentration left you writhing on the ground, your ribcage completely caved in. Kurapika loomed over you, worried. As great as you felt beneath his feet, you were his best lead on the Phantom Troupe's location. He started fussing over your broken body when suddenly his face relaxed, and he broke out into laughter:

"How could I forget about my Holy Chain! I can't believe I was so worried." he quickly conjured the cross-shaped chain on his thumb and wrapped it around you. At your size it didn't take much nen to heal you, and soon your chest had reformed. Even your legs had healed completely, leaving no sign that they had been pulverized under Kurapika's shoe only minutes ago.

Admiring his handiwork, Kurapika grinned darkly as he realized that thanks to his nen he could be as rough as he wanted with his new toy.

Meanwhile you were still recovering both mentally and physically from your ordeal. As you lifted your shirt to check for scars, for any sign of what had just happened to you, the air suddenly became a lot thicker. Looking up you saw that Kurapika had surrounded you with his feet, once again forcing you to breathe the foul air around his soles.

"Now that your legs are better, how about that massage?" the smug grin was back in full force with the confidence that he could do anything he wanted to you if you refused.

"Just wait a second." you panted, still shaken by your brush with death. Each gasp filled your lungs with Kurapika's foot musk, "Give me a minute to catch my breath."

Kurapika frowned at that, and grabbed you by the chest with his toes before you could react. You struggled as hard as you could to get out, the smell between his toes was the most potent yet. But as hard as you struggled you couldn't so much as budge the toes that were lifting you into the air. The situation almost made you want to laugh. You, an experienced nen user who had worked for some of the most dangerous groups in the world, had been bruised, battered, and broken by the bare feet of a novice Hunter. You couldn't even get out from between his toes!

You were pulled out of your self pity by a sharp pain at your sides. Kurapika was squeezing you with his toes, and squeezing hard.

"You clearly don't understand your situation." the pressure increased even more. You weren't sure how much more your ribs could take, and sure enough the first once gave out with a-

CRACK

"When I tell you to give me a foot rub."

CRACK

"You."

CRACK

"Rub."

He raised his foot again, leaning forward to watch you writhe in agony for a moment before conjuring his healing chain and mending your ribs for the second time.

Kurapika looked down at you, pinned between his toes, and said darkly:

"Now...."

choices: Tai's Feet are Tired, Take those Shoes and Wet Socks Off!
145332333223113.content:
Note: This takes place directly after the kids get sucked into the Digital World. They have not found their Digimon companions yet...

Tai roughly shoved some vines out of his way, stomping through the muggy and humid jungle terrain. The brown haired boy was PISSED, who did that 'cool guy' Matt think he was?! They'd never gotten along even at school..but the confusion brought on by them all being in this strange land had everyone on edge.

Everyone was unsure where they were and their compasses and any form of survival skills didn't seem to be doing much good. "Gee, some good camp has done us..." Tai grumbled as he stomped along.

Of course, Matt and Tai had gotten into an argument which led to a bit of a fight. They were separated by the others and Tai stormed off on his own...despite the pleas from the girls.

Tai was still seething, and he needed something to take his anger out on...that was when he felt a crunch under his large shoe.

Looking down to see what he'd stepped on, his eyes narrowed in slight confusion as he squatted down to see what appeared to be a tiny hut.

Next to his shoe, a tiny...human-looking creature was squeaking up profanities at him and gesturing to the hut he'd just crushed into nothing.

Raising an eyebrow, Tai reached down two enormous fingers and plucked the squirming being up to inspect. Holding it before his gargantuan eye, he was able to see it was indeed at least human in appearance.

That was when the being produced a spear and poked him in the eye! "Yeowch!" Releasing the tiny to clutch the affected area, Tai cared not as the tiny fell to its death miles down below.

"Alright, what the heck is everyone's problem today?!" Tai roared and stomped a foot down on the corpse of the fallen bugman.

A multitude of squeaks were heard and Tai put his hands on his hips and gave a mischievous grin, "I think I just found a way to take the edge off..."
145332333223113.title: Tai and the Tiny Village

1453323332231131.content:
Tai was still feeling mad from everything that happened up intill now, and now these runts are trying to blind him! Their like a bunch of pesky bugs, and there's only one thing he does to bugs...

Lifted up his shoe, Tai stomped down on the ground making the tiny humanoids all fall due to the mighty shake of his stomp. Tai then stepped onto the heel of his shoe, with his shoe planted to the ground the spiky brunette started pulling his damp sock out of the shoe. Following up with the other, Tai then started peeling off his glued on socks to reveal his plump chessy feet.

It had been a hot summer day and the sudden snow only made the sweat stick to his clothed feet. Arriving in this new jungle world brought more heat to them.

The tinies below coughed as a chessy odor came over them as Tai planted both his huge feet on either side of them. The spiky haired boy grinned cockily as he wiggled his toes.

"What's the matter my stench too much for you shrimp?", Tai mockingly asked.

Some of the tiny humanoids tried running away only for Tai to lift a foot bring it down on the fleeing specks. The panicked yells were silenced by the plump sole making a squish sound. That installed fear in their fellow tinies, Tai was unconcerned as he didn't feel them crunch meaning their probably just smushed into his sole.

What was next?

1453323332233121.content:
You belonged to a coven of witches, the same coven which Medusa Gorgon and Eruka Frog belonged to. You had been contacted by Medusa while she was undercover as the DWMA's head nurse. You had been undercover yourself for about a month, you worked as Medusa's 'nurse office assistant'.

You were around early 20's, though looked young enough to be a student. You had managed to suppress your destructive warlock's soul wavelength thanks to Medusa's teachings. Medusa was practically your mentor and a mother-figure to you.
But you should've never trusted her, seeing how cruel she was to Crona who was her own child.

You should've known she couldn't be trusted!

But it was too late now. You see, Medusa had formed a plan to get rid of a particularly powerful student here at DWMA. One who could be a nuisance to her ambitions. Of course she persuaded you to do the dirty deed yourself.

She used a shrinking spell to make you a mere 1 inch in size. She deposited you outside of Black*Star's home, and gave you a potion to grow back to normal size once you were inside and ready to strike.

Unfortunately for you, the potion was mere club soda. Medusa had grown tired of you and this was her way of getting rid of you AND taking the heat off of her being a suspect of the 'spy' inside DWMA.

So there you were, waiting on the infamously obnoxious Black*Star to make his appearance.

It had been only five minutes, when a thunderous voice declared "YAHOO!" from the other side of the front door, and it was kicked open forcefully.

There in the doorway, wearing his usual outfit of a black vest, white baggy pants and big shoes...was your target.

He was ENORMOUS! You knew you were small...but this kid made you feel like nothing just by being in his mere presence! Speaking of which, he was walking into the house...his booming footfalls like earthquakes to you!

You looked up at the walkway in both fear and awe, the massive boy looked higher then any mountain. And lord Death.... that booming voice! The rattling in your eardrums grew as the blue haired giant let out a booming laugh as he slammed the door.

Black*Star grinned widely as he put his hands behind his head, the sweaty greased up pits of his started to spill out a sour odor. He had the apartment all to himself, Tsubaki had tried to convince him to join a study group the others organized but of course his confidence was too high.

"HA i don't need a study session, just gotta spend some time reading and I'll be on top of that test!", the ninja confidently huffed as he walked into the livingroom, ready to kick back after a long day.

"Alright you loud brat, let's see you handle this!", focusing on your magic you began to materialize an thunder bolt, hopefully you could stun the giant and take care of him then. Charging up like some spiky haired alien you put your hands forward.

"TAKE THISSSS!", The sure of energy travelled to your palms and then-

Zap

Instead of a power beam a simple flicker of electricity came out and only went a few inches from your hands. You looked in silence before a cloud of dread fell over you. "S-shit shrinking must've lowered my magic to?"

The violent shaking boom drew you out of your thought as a shadow suddenly covered you. Dread filled you as looking up you saw Black*Star taking his next step....and placing his large grey shoe sole above you!

You widened your eyes as the giant was grinning oblivious to the tiny soul beneath him. The flat shoe sole seem to slowly descend as if mocking you before it crushed you. Black*Star's foot suddenly stomped faster filling your whole sky with the shoe sole.

"I can't end like this!", closing your eyes you awaited the eventual crushing weight of the giant ninja.

BOOM

You were thrown to the ground as another massive step was taken. However you weren't crushed nor beneath a shoe, opening your eyes miraculously the foot ended up a few inches ahead with the heel resting in front of you.

Black*Star grinned as he spotted the couch, rather then walking the rest of the way the ninja wanted to jump to relaxing. Bending his legs and stretching the pants over his rear the ninja hopped up and twisted to land butt first on his couch.

The ninja let out a loud sigh as he crossed his large feet, putting the soles that nearly squashed you on display. Black*Star hummed as he swayed his feet, enjoying his sweaty body unwinding.

Soon the ninja...

choices: Black*Star is feeling pretty BIG right now! Time for ego trip!
145332333223312112.content:
You couldn't believe this, you were shrunk with NO MAGIC! And you had just almost died from being stomped on of all things! Laying there on the same spot you landed when you fell, as Black*Star was relaxing on the couch up ahead, you got to your feet.

You looked around to get your bearings. You were too far from the door to make it back at this size.

Wait, this size! You had your potion to regrow yourself! It might take some explaining once Star saw an intruder in his house, but it was better than either dying underfoot or starving to death in this wasteland.

Pulling the tiny vial from your robe, you uncorked it and chugged. Tossing away the empty vial, you couldn't place the taste...but it was fizzy like soda of some kind.

The blue-haired boy happened to open his eyes and look down at a strange moving speck on his floor. "Huh?" Black*Star mumbled to himself, leaning forward with his hands on his knees and squinting.

Being an assassin and a member of the Star Clan, the blue-haired teen had keen eyesight. So he was able to make out at least that whatever the speck was it was humanoid in shape.

With a grunt, he pulled his legs back and gave the room another shot of his pants tightening over his butt. He launched himself from the couch and landed with both feet on either side of this puny whatever-it-was.

You panicked once more, why wasn't it working?! You saw him looking DIRECTLY at you and then your entire world shook when both feet landed on either side of you.

"ALRIGHT, WHO THE HELL ARE YOU?!" The voice, like that of a thunderclap, demanded from high above. Black*Star's pants once more tightened over his shapely rear as he squatted down over you. He raised an eyebrow and reached down for you.

"Shit shit shit!!" You screamed before you were pinched up between two thick fingers. Star brought the runt to his eye and scowled. "I know that outfit, you're a witch!" He boomed at close proximity.

"N-no! Not at all!" You denied, your voice high pitched and squeaky to the titan.

"I betcha came in here to assassinate the great Black*Star! But what kinda dumbass plan was making yourself so puny?!" The star-haired teen roared, then bellowed with mocking laughter that blew his stinky breath at you.

You sweated in nervousness as the two warm digits alone were enough to hold you in place. Suddenly you yelled in shock as Black*Star tossed you into the air before landing on the fingerless gloved palm.

You were immobilized as the palm wrapped around you from the neck down. Black*Star suddenly slung his muscled arm behind his head, his sweaty and wide pit was soon revealed. Black*Star chuckled as he felt the puny body against his rank pit. Moving his finger, the bluenette started dragging you up and down the hot pit. Soon...

Above, Black*Star grinned as he saw his sweaty pit open up to release it's powerful stench once again. Sure enough he spotted you tangled up in his greasy blue hairs, coughing as the fresh air was repelled by the toxic odors of the his mighty sweat.

"Wooo my pit did a number on you! How's it feel, that's a true giant's stench right there, no scratch that your god's divine odor HAHA!", Black*Star ecstatically yelled as he reached in and pulled you out of the rope like hairs.

You panted as you were pulled out of the odorous prison and brought to the booming giant's face. Black*Star smirked as he took in your disheleved form covered in his got sweat. Taking a large sniff, you nearly were sucked into the nose of the giant.

Black*Star grinned as he brought you to his eyes. "There got my first worshiper smelling like his master!", you twitched your eye, this giant demoted you to some kind of boot licker!

Before you could let out even a squeak Black*Star sat up and set you on his thigh. You paled as the towering boy hit you with his mighty b.o, his smug face in the heavens as he stretched his arms.

"Gonna need to get my worshipper settled into his new role eh? Well fine by me!, the blue haired giant boomed down.

Black*Star....

"So you don't know what happened to me? Great..." You mumbled.

Prompto...
1513311.title: Prompto

15133111.content:
"You got a bad attitude little dude." Prompto chuckled and pinched you between his sweaty fingers.

"Me?! You found someone who was tiny and helpless and you're treating it like a joke!" You huffed.

"Somebody should teach you some manners." Prompto said with a mischievous grin.

"... What do you mean? Just let me go and I'll find someone that actually wants to help me." You protested, squirming in between his giant fingers.

"Sorry shorty, I found ya first!" Prompto continued to laugh before he...
15133111.title: Got annoyed that you were yelling at him.

choices: Prompto put his arm down, squashing you into his pit.
Prompto kept using you as a replacement deodorant stick.
151331111.content:
Prompto raised his muscular arm, revealing his sweaty, bare armpit.

"What are you-?!" You began to speak, but Prompto quickly stuffed you underneath his arm.

Your body sank into the soft, smelly flesh as Prompto rubbed you around in small circles.

"How's it smellin', little man?" Prompto asked tauntingly.

Your small, frail body became soaked with sweat as the giant blond marked you with his manly scent. Your eyes watered as he smooshed you deeper into the rank skin.

"Haven't used deodorant all day, sorry for the smell!" Prompto jokingly said, although it smelled like he hadn't used deodorant in at least a week...
151331111.title: Lifted his arm

1513311112.content:
Peeling you off of the sticky, reeking hollow that was his armpit, the blond jokester held you in front of his face. You glared at that colossal, widely grinning mug before an intense suction nearly ripped your clothes off.

"Peeeeyew!" His voice rattled your eardrums. "That's bad! Oh well, sucks for you rude lil fella! I got another pit!" Prompto switched you to his other hand and raised the opposite arm.

"Wai-" You tried to protest but he practically slapped you in there.
1513311112.title: Prompto's Deodorant

choices: Prompto flexed his bicep, squishing you even more.
Prompto decided to go for a run.
Prompto took you out of his pit and did something else with you.
15133111121.content:
Prompto mashed your small body into the center of his armpit and laughed as you gagged at the smell and wriggled around.

"Sorry little guy, you're no match for a giant's pits! Maybe ya shouldn't be so mean to someone that wanted to help!" Prompto let go of you, leaving you glued to his smelly skin.

You couldn't even move, it was like being stuck to fly paper... terrible smelling fly paper. Prompto flexed his bicep above you before lowering his arm to his side. You immediately felt pressure on your back as Prompto moved his arm up and down, grinding you between the walls of stinky, warm skin.

"If only you had a little friend, then I'd have sweat soakers for both of my pits!" Prompto joked as you heard his muffled voice.
15133111121.title: Prompto traps you in there!

choices: Prompto wants his pit sweat licked up!
Prompto Peels you out...after more mocking!
151331111212.content:
"Hmm....I think I'll go for a nice run!" Prompto declared with a wide joyful smile. You groaned from within Prompto's rancid pit, his sweat output would be cranked up to 11 and not to mention the stench increase.

Nonetheless, Prompto was feeling too good about having this much power over someone to push the idea out of his mind now.

"Sucks for you lil fella, it's a hot day today!" Prompto snickered as he took off down the sidewalk. Prince Noctis and himself had taken a road trip in the Regalia..the king himself's vehicle. They were currently stopped for the afternoon in a town of Lestallum...a sunny place..unfortunately for you.

Prompto wore a constant happy smile on his face as he greeted passerby on his jog. Given his carefree and happy-go-lucky demeanor...no one could imagine him tormenting anyone smaller and weaker than him.

But it wasn't like you didn't deserve it for giving him lip! Prompto merely saw this as one of his pranks...perhaps a long running one by the time he decided to give up his hold on you.

By the end of his run, he flopped down on a bench in a deserted park and sighed...he wiped sweat from his brow and felt sweat literally running down his underarms.

"Whew...I'm burning up! I can't imagine what you're goin' through little guy!" Raising his arm, he peered underneath.
151331111212.title: Prompto decided to go for a run.

choices: Prompto is satisfied and takes you out... onto the other pit!
Prompto isn't satisfied and forces you into his armpit harder.
You try and beg for mercy!
1513311112121.content:
Prompto cringed as he saw your sweat-soaked body in his now even smellier armpit. You began to slide down the pit along with the sweat, you'd become unglued to the hot surface.

"Man... my pit looks even worse than I thought it would!" Prompto snickered before reaching into his pit and putting his finger on your back.

You managed to raise your head enough to talk.

"I-I learned my lesson okay? Just let me go! It's so gross in here! Maybe we could start over and be fr-" You were cut off as a drop of sweat entered your mouth.

You coughed and gagged as the salty liquid traveled down your tiny throat. Prompto burst into laughter, snorting as your face turned a sickly green.

"Oh dude, that must've tasted TERRIBLE! Come to think of it, my pits could use some cleaning! Get to lickin' and then we'll see what else I can do with ya." Prompto pressed your body back into his pit, this time with your mouth wide opened.

Your tongue made contact with the sweaty skin, making your eyes water and your stomach turn. The giant blonde rubbed you gently across the pit, using your tongue to clean up his nasty sweat.

"You should be thankful I'm givin' you a free drink! Don't drown though, I still got another pit for you to lick clean!" Prompto grinned.

You began to lick frantically, just wanting to please the giant jokester. With each lick you felt sicker and sicker, and your tongue was burning. You also had to deal with the rank smell and the uncomfortable feeling of being squished into the stinky pit.
1513311112121.title: Prompto wants his pit sweat licked up!

choices: Prompto Humiliates You More In There!
Prompto's Phone Rings, Time to Store You Somewhere
15133111121212.content:
Prompto sighed, it felt REALLY good...but the giant jokester still wasn't satisfied. "Come on little fella, I KNOW you can do better than that! You were really putting that mouth to use earlier!" Prompto boomed.

You whimper and try to lick more, but are reduced to gagging at the horrid taste and burning on your tongue. Prompto snickers and presses you harder into his pit. "Y'know, if you can't do a good job lickin', then I could always use ya as a pit wipe!" The blonde giant laughs, half joking.

Of course, you can't tell if he's just teasing you..but you can't say you're leaning towards it being a joke since he was literally rubbing you into his rancid pit!

Prompto presses you deeper into his soft, stank armpit, liking the way you feel against his skin. He also thoroughly enjoys your squirming, this was pretty fun!

Meanwhile, you were in hell. You couldn't believe this big blonde goof was humiliating you so much! ESPECIALLY with his revolting STINK!

You could hardly protest though. Your body was being pushed deeper into a never ending canyon of pit flesh that reeked to high heaven!
15133111121212.title: Deeper and Deeper

151331111212122.content:
Prompto had a toothy grin as he pushed your speck like body into his hot and rank pit. Not only was the heat getting him hotter but his workout had his toned body shedding a potent body odor.

This included a thick sour musk that you were directly inhaling from the squishy skin you were sinking into. The hot and steamy flesh was surrounding you as your nostrils burned from the reeking and toxic odor.

"You know i think my little buddy needs a warm hug!", Prompto chuckled removing his finger and finding his sweat keeping you glued to his fuzzy pit.

While hugs were usually warm gestures, this giant hug was more of a mocking blow to your size. Darkness shrouded over you and the aura of musk got thicker. Looking up, your tear filled eyes widened as the large toned arm began to come down!

"Wai-cough!, I'm sorry okay!", you fruitlessly yelled as you swallowed more of the hot greasy sweat.

Prompto chuckled as he deliberately slowed down the descent, feeling his hot skin stick together slowly. "Aw what's wrong little guy, everybody needs a hug right?"

You paled as soon the michivious face of the blond giant was covered by the sweaty wall approaching. Soon the hot musk became like a thick potent blanket as Prompto pressed his arm to his body.

A squelch rang out as two walls, one firm and the other squishy released another burst of intoxicating sweat and sour odor. You felt like you were in a hot reeking sauna with the walls being soft and soaked with greasy sweat.

Prompto sighed as he leaned back on the bench, putting his other arm behind his head to let the other pit breath. Your squirming had been squashed as the vast pit enveloped you in hot odorous flesh.
151331111212122.title: Prompto's Sour Cavern

153.content:
Mike was a seventeen year old who's life was running an ordinary course. His father was a scientist in the space corporation, though Mike simply thought he studied stars.

Mike's father turned out to be studying more then just stars. The scientists in the space corporation were set on making a ship for outer solar system travel!

On take your kid to work day, Mike ended up getting in trouble. While looking around, Mike stumbled across the ship and accidentally set it off! The ship took off and all Mike could do was shout in terror.

Awakening, Mike noticed the ship had stopped. Climbing out, Mike expected to see his angry dad.

But instead he saw three giant aliens looking down at him in shock. The next thing the aliens saw was the tiny human fainting.

It turns out the ship worked. Mike was now on a planet called Churķ, and every inhabitant here was a giant to him. While some had wanted to experiment on the tiny creature, others were more merciful.

Seeing him as a intelligent creature, the world council decided intill contact could be made with earth, Mike would be under protection from Churķ's top general.

On this unfamiliar planet, Mike was lucky to make some great giant companions.

- One was Linf, a seventeen year old orange humanoid with pointy ears and a lean built. He was a really friendly guy, but seem to suffer from low self-esteem. He acted as if Mike was made of glass whenever he held him for the first time. The two now have a close friendship.

- Another was Linf's father, Lue. The general was the opposite of his son as he had a bulky body and more serious attitude. His top priority is making sure Mike's safe, as he fears any harm will result in a war with earth.

- Next was Linf's friend Hal. The sixteen year old blue humanoid was slightly chubby, and was very sensitive. He's shown to develop a crush on Mike as he is always kind to him.

- Then there's Fler the buff red humanoid. The relationship was complicated. While Fler acted friendly towards Mike, he was more hostile to Linf. This could be since he was jealous that "The nerd got to take care of the alien".

Now Mike's life consist of living among a much different, much larger species.

Currently Mike is..........

15531112.content:
You huffed and puffed as you scaled the side of the Tennyson family RV lovingly called the Rustbucket. Your name was unpronounceable in the human tongue, given your alien origins, you were a purple skinned and green eyed humanoid...and your race was renowned for your gift of shrinkage.

You were a master of your race's special ability, and even though the stature of your people was normally the size of an action figure...you currently were the size of one of Earth's so called ladybugs.

Despite the dishonor that came with it, you utilized your special 'gift' to make a name for yourself as a well known contract killer. It was quite easy to kill people unawares when you could be mistaken for a bug so easily...but that also came with various dangers of being squashed like one.

Currently you were under the employ of the arch-nemesis of Ben Tennyson....Vilgax. He wanted the brown haired young human out of the way, so you were willing to accept the very hefty bounty.

You finally reached the side window and peered through the dirty glass. It was late into the humid and sticky night, it was still during the planet's summer season after all.

To your surprise, you saw a dim glow of some sort of electronic gadget coming from what your intel marked as Ben's room.

Pulling out what looked like a mini laser cutter, you cut a hole in the glass and scampered through. You were not only a uniquely gifted alien, you also had an array of gadgets to help assist you. Jumping off of the ledge, you extended a pair of glider wings and soared in to the bedroom in question.

One of the drawbacks of being of your species...was your powerful sense of smell...it was far more powerful than that of a human's. So that meant when you crossed the threshold in to Ben's room...your nose burned and you became overwhelmed with the plethora of unhygienic boy smells.

Coughing and gagging, you of course lost your concentration and your glider wing impacted the side of the doorway..sending you careening out of control!

You hacked and coughed as you tried to save yourself, you thankfully had a soft landing...

Ben meanwhile, was relaxing on his messy bed, rancid and unclean socked feet crossed at the end of the bed as he was engrossed in his handheld videogame. Staying up late was fun!

The question is...where did YOU land?
15531112.title: Breaking and Entering

155311122.content:
Ben often was more preoccupied with having fun then keeping things tidy. Because of that his dirty laundry was spread throughout the room as a sort of collection of smelly cloths.

On in particular was a somewhat large pile of socks, visible trails of steam could be seen rising from the dirty and tinted green socks. While Ben did tent to wear a pair for more then a day, he did like to stink up a couple at a time.

Your yells turned to coughs as you landed in the damp and soft pile. Diving in had put you under a layer of heavy warm blankets. Musky sweat and cheddary odors surrounded you as the thick clothes acted like quicksand pulling you in deeper. The stench was overwhelming and clouded your nostrils with the powerful cheese.

Ben wiggled his large does inside of the stinky socks. "Hm I should let the dogs out, give em a chance to breath!", the brunette chuckled as using his toes he gribbed onto the other sock and started pulling.

The damp cloths soon were peeled off with a sticker like noise. Soon Ben's big and plump soles were given a breath of the humid air. The warm air helped fan out the chessy stench of the feet and spread the odor as he wiggled his toes.
155311122.title: Sock Landing

choices: Ben Gets Up....Watch out for Those BAREFEET!
Ben Decides to Go to Sleep...Nows Your Chance!
1553111221.content:
You HAD to get out, you felt like you were suffocating in a thick cheesy soup! The rancid socks ranged from freshly soaked to crusty and having sat there for quite some time. You couldn't tell which was worse..or more disgusting. The fresh ones were wet and as you clawed around the pile, some of the salty discolored fluid within would squirt out at you.

This became a predicament when it got in to your eyes and blinded you. You thrashed and squirmed like a dying fish, surrounded by horrid funky cheese stench and sticky, damp cloth.

Somehow you managed to breach the top of the hellish pile...only for two freshly peeled socks to be dropped on top of you! "AAAAAAHHH!" You screamed at the top of your lungs, this was a fresh new hell that Ben had unknowingly plopped on you.

These socks having been fresh from Ben's funky feet, presented an entire new world of stench and sogginess. They were still newly wet and pungent and VERY cheddary.

The newer foot odor mixed with the old beneath you, and you felt a tinge of regret having accepted this job.

Eventually you managed to escape the hold of the newly removed socks. Looking above you however, you saw the meaty feet on the enormous bed above you. You glared at the nasty peds, your gaze filled with hate as if the wiggling toes were somehow mocking you.

What happens next..?
1553111221.title: Clawing to the Top

choices: Ben went to bed, with you stuck to his sole
Ben felt something under his foot
15531112211.content:
Ben let out a big yawn as he rubbed his eyes. Late night gaming was fun, but he didn't wanna risk falling asleep and losing his progress. So he saved the game and sat up before stretching.

"Yawn... well I can finish tomorrow!", Ben grinned as he flexed his BIG squishy feet and swung them to the side to get out of bed.

You widened your eyes as the sky was suddenly replaced with the stinky sole of Ben's cheesy foot. Quickly you pulled yourself out of the pile and tumbled to the ground, just in time as Ben stepped onto the crusty sock pile.

"Hehe, the piles getting pretty big. Glad it's got the order of cheese!", Ben chuckled as he stepped onto the floor, a wet SLAP echoed as the damp sole stomped the ground.

You started sprinting as Ben obliviously stomped after you, booming chesse slaps shook the ground as you had to jump out of the foot's shadow.

Unfortunately, a drop of sweat flew off of the plump sole, stepping into the drop had you falling forward onto your face. You looked up in shock as Ben's sole was over you and stomped down.

"H-HEY WAI-!"

SMOOSH

The plump, cheesy sole squashed you yo the hard floor. Intense weight pressed you down as the sole molded around you, the thick funky cheese was inhaled by your strong nose. The slimy sole kept you pinned as Ben stood standing on your tiny body.

Soon....
15531112211.title: Beware The Barefeet

155311122111.content:
Turning the lights out, Ben hopped in to his bed and sighed as he relaxed with his arms behind his head. His black and white t-shirt had sticky pit stains on it...and the boy likely wasn't going to change out of it or bathe any time soon. Cracking open a green eye and glancing out at the humid night outside, Ben grunted. "Sheesh, it's even warm with the sun down..."

Meanwhile, you were flattened and molded to the gargantuan plump sole of your target. "This is so humiliating!" were your thoughts at the moment.

You were unfortunately facing the cheddary sole that you were currently pressed into. This meant you were faced with an onslaught of stench non-stop...and the sticky boysweat of the kid's unclean feet.

Soon a light snoring met your ears, the brat being asleep would be perfect for you to succeed in your mission..IF you didn't currently have a mouthful of rank foot!

Struggle as you might, you weren't coming any further to being unstuck. Luckily your durable body was able to take being stepped on...but that only meant you had been pressed deeper into the mushy sole and forced to suffer!

What happens now..?
155311122111.title: Ben's Bedtime

1553111221111.content:
Luck seem to be on your side as while he snoozed away, Ben flexed his large cheesy feet. The mold your body had been smooshed into began stretching and releasing your now dampened limbs.

With some force you soon popped out of the plump sole, letting out an "OAF!" as you hit the matress below. You glared up at the towering sole emitting its sweaty chesse stench, getting squashed wasn't fun and it provided more of a drive to finish the job.

Looking around the dirty heel, you saw Ben's snoring head was seemingly miles away. Totally unaware of the organism he just stepped on.

The chessy odor flooded your sensitive nose and you could see the sweaty pit stains in the distance. You groaned as you didn't think the smell would be this bad.

You coughed before.....
1553111221111.title: Furthur Distances

choices: Ben Moves His Foot and You're Slammed Into His Jam!
15531112211112.content:
You were overtaken by a shadow as soon as you finished your coughing fit. Looking up, you saw the horrific sight of Ben's pudgy sole once more descending on top of you!

"No...NOOO!" You screamed as you took off running. Unfortunately for you, Ben's mattress wasn't very firm ground. You ended up falling on your face and praying to whatever god was listening.

The foot slammed down...but you didn't feel any pressure. You rolled over onto your back and found yourself face to face with Ben's rancid big-toe gap. You felt vomit fill your mouth as the concentrated cheese and vinegar stench hit you like a ton of bricks.

Not to mention the sight of this clogged crevice made your stomach turn even more. Ben literally had a mountain of toe grime and disgusting linty crud between his toes! You yourself were dwarfed by this kid's TOE JAM and this face made you feel quite insignificant.

Standing up to your wobbly legs, you took in your surroundings. On either side of you was a toe, Ben's big toe and his second toe to be exact.

What do you do..?
