155331.content:
(Note: these characters may seem anime like, just a head up.)

When the concept of vampires comes to the mind of people, many think the same. Thier angsty, eternal teens that are misunderstood. However, they are far different and don't appreciate the stereotype.

Vampires in the modern age struggled. With all the updated technology, it was becoming difficult to feed without being caught on camera. A solution soon graced the blood-suckers however.

A new drug capable of shrinking humans down to a inch was made possible, a side effect was that the human was made immortal so blood could continually be drawn. Although expensive, buying a tiny human was easy for many vampires as most were wealthy having built up social power over the years.

You had been a victim to this drug. While out partying, your friends convinced you to join them in a round. It was soon revealed that the party was a ploy to gather humans to shrink and sell to vampires, and you and your friends were taken to be sent to a vampire family.

Now which family are you sent to?

The Akusumi family resided in Japan. They had a half eurpeon ethnicity, which is were thier vampire gene came from. This family consist of three brothers.

Ryouta
- A physically seventeen year old, with a lean body that had a eight pack and toned biceps and stood at 6'3. He had shaggy yellowish gold hair and red eyes as well as black nails and pierced ears. While not cruel, he would like having a tiny human admire him. Instead of master, he'd rather be called a god.

Byakuka
- The oldest brother that looked to be in his tweaties at 6'7. He always presents himself in a formal manner, wearing expensive suits over his large built. He wears small glasses over his red eyes and has long dark blue hair tied in a low ponytail. While seemingly charming to guests, he has a no nonsense attitude and will give punishment to the tiny human if needed.

Satoru
- This white haired vampire looked to be slightly older then Ryouta and standing at 6'5. This very buff vampire with a sanpaku stare seems intimidating, but is actually just quiet. Satoru is ashamed of being a vampire, not wanting to drink from any human. He would try to avoid the tiny human, but also couldn't help but get close as he found him cute.

The carry case you and your friend were in rocked slightly. It was being carried by a vampire with a hooded cloak, as he was merely delivering and didn’t have enough money for a anti-sun ring.

“I can’t believe this, not only are we tiny but we’re being sold to a vampire!”, your friend yelled panicking. You stayed silent, still in shock about the situation.

It happened so suddenly. One moment your partying, and the next your an inch tall. Everyone in the club dwindled down to the floor, all confused on the new ordeal. Suddenly, hooded figures like the one carry you began to scoop up all the shrunken humans into cases. When one nearly escaped out the door, one of the captors simply stepped on it. All that got was a complain from another, telling him not to waste the humans.

Eventually the sound of a door knock and opening altered you and your friend. The top of the case opened and you closed your eyes as light poured in and the back of your shirt was lifted. Being set down, you opened your eyes and saw three new figures.

One had on a suit, which look to be hiding a large built. The brunette had a stoic gaze as he looked at the table you sat on.

In the middle, was a thin and lean boy wearing a black gakuran and trousers. He had dirty blond hair and wore glasses. He also had on a evil smirk.

Finally, the last one was lean though you could see muscle from beneath his silk shirt. The blond and big eyebrowed man had on brown trousers and lace up boots, as well as a purple cape.

“Ah~ thank you so much for the delivery.”, the dirty blond said in a cheerful tone.

You heard a grunt, as the hooded captor exited. You watched as the figure closed the door, leaving you and your friends with the vampires. Looking forward again, you gasped as the vampire with glasses was now inches away. His smirking face stared at you with childish glee.

“Wow~ papa was right you are small. I wonder how long it would take to smoosh you.”, the vampire tapped his finger to your chest, knocking you onto your butt.

“Back off you git! I’m the one who gets the humans first.”, the eyebrowed vampire came forward and pulled the glasses vampire back by his shoulder.

The dirty blond pouted. “Ah, no fair Arthur. I even bought new shoes to have fun”. The vampire brought up a long and large foot dressed in a brown leather shoe. Just what fun is he talking about?!

“I don’t care! I go first, then you can crush them as much as you want”

Just before things got out of hand, the supposed eldest brother came forward and pushed them apart. “Enough! You can have your fun in due time, but first introductions.”

All three brothers brought their gaze to the two of you. Three pairs of red eyes stared at you and your friend.

“Now then, humans my name is Winston Soleonos. These are my two brothers Harold and Arthur. You were brought here to be our source of food, however our father has given us premition to do as we please with you.”

You paled, the both of you were now food to a trio of vampires. Plus, they seem to want to do more then just eat.

“As your fist duty, you will be spending time with.....

(Shout out to TheGamerSwordsman ;) )
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"And finally we reach the end of our tour, saving the best for last is Fenrir castle!"

Jacob readied his camera as the tour guide presented a large castle's ruins.

The 22 year old man was a history nut. Anything from the middle ages peaked his interest and made him crave researching it. This tour was on his bucket list as he always wanted to visit the mysterious castle.

"It's said that this castle appeared out of nowhere, as all ancient accounts back then said it mysterious showed up here. Further more inside lay numerous paintings and even bones that show animal like figures inhabitanting the castle."

Jacob took as many pictures as he could. Unlike others who spend thier time chatting or texting, the man wanted to explore the mysterious ruins to the fullest. As they walked through, Jacob stopped and trailed behind. Out in a courtyard of sorts, sat a large podium. Walking up to the architecture, he noticed the similar drawings from inside.

Lions, dogs, and other anthromorphic creatures were clad in armor while other animals wore clothes. Jacob soon took notice of a blue sphere in the middle of the podium, and felt compelled to touch it.

Doing so caused a strange reaction. The sphere began to glow and winds picked up around Jacob. He could only close his eyes in shock as the blue light shined brightly.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Opening his eyes, Jacob had to blink the blurriness away. Oddly, there seemed to be voices around him and the ground was shaking slightly. As his vision cleared, he felt his jaw drop as the podium was now stretching into the sky like a skyscraper!

Turning away, he was in shock again as he saw giant anthromorphic animals walking around the once ruined courtyard. Jacob was about to walk, but stopped realizing he needed to think about his pan of action. This turned out to be a good choice, had he stepped forward he would've found himself flattened under a passing Doberman's paw.

Jacob looked around the courtyard, if these anthros were talking and walking then they would be able to help him. Around the courtyard, three individuals sparked his interest.

Walking out of a entryway into the courtyard was a fennec fox. He had on brown trousers and a sleeveless black hooded tunic, showing his toned furry biceps and large orange ears poking through holes on top. In one hand was a sword and the other a sheath, he most likely was a blacksmith.

Over by a wall, a large lion was talking to a smaller one. After nodding, the smaller lion bowed and left. The anthro lion was dressed in a suit of armor, with his burgundy mane in a low ponytail. The armor was large and showed his wide broad shoulders. Based on how it was shaped, Jacop assumed the lion must have quite the amount of muscle.

Lastly, under a tree was a hyena who was scanning the ground. The anthro seem to be of noble status as he had a silk shirt and wrinkle free trousers, unlike the other two he was wearing a pair of blue slippers. The silk shirt seem to be painted on as you could see all his muscles pressing against the confinement of the shirt. The hyena adjusted his spectacles as he seem to be looking for something.

You soon decided to get the help of.......

Isaac signed laying on his bed. The worn out furniture creaked from his weight. His old room was showing it's age with it's dust and fading colors.

He had just graduated high school, age 18 when he got the call. His family's old cabin was sold and he was tasked by his parents to check it out before the buyers arrived. Upon arriving, he immediately had a nostalgia shock as he saw his old room.

All his toys, cards, and.....book?

Looking between his bed and the wall was a stapled together mesh of papers. Gently pulling it out, Isaac's eyes widened. It was his old story he wrote.

The book told the story of a far off land where mythical creatures lived. However, they all walked around like people and talked.

There were some notable ones. Like the knight unicorns in shining armor covering a hulking bod. Muscled gyrphons with laid back attitudes causally flying around. Also the buff Cerberus would guard the gate even with his three heads bickering sometimes.

A lot of the drawings put emphasis on the muscles, which Isaac couldn't deny.

Suddenly, the book seem to....glow?

Isaac closed his eyes as the book flashed and sent him into as slumber. After the light cleared, all that was left was the book.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
As Isaac came to, he immediately noticed a difference in the air. Opening his eyes they widened.

Everything was huge! Or did he shrink?!

As he tried to get his bearings, Isaac felt the ground begin to shake in a series of rhythmic steps. A shadow soon loomed over him and Isaac gulped before taking one glance at the scenery before he would turn towards the giant.

This was the day... you were finally being adopted. It was an extremely difficult process, because of you being an inch tall, you were an outcast and nobody wanted to have to take care of someone as small as you.

That was until a man named Jake Adams decided to adopt you, he was a tall, muscular man with brown hair and a goatee. Jake told you that he had a son of his own, but his wife was no longer in the picture.

The door to the adoption agency opened and Jake walked in. You were sitting on the counter as Jake filled out the last of the paperwork, picking you up in his giant hand and placing you on his shoulder.

"Are you excited to meet your new brother?" Jake asked you "He's just a little older than you, I think you two will get along."

"I hope so... does he know about my size?" You asked.

"Well no... I haven't told him yet. He's been away at a fitness training camp for a month and he knew that I was looking to adopt, but that's about it, he just came back last night." Jake explained as he got into his car and began driving you to your new home.

The two of you arrived and Jake walked into the house, you could hear music playing from upstairs.

"Jackson! I'm back with your new little brother!" Jake yelled.

You heard the music stop as Jake covered you with his hands, you guessed that he wanted to keep you a surprise until Jake got downstairs.

You could see through the crack of Jake's hand as Jackson walked down the stairs. He was like a younger version of Jake, he was wearing a red tank top and had a bandana wrapped around his brown hair.

"Huh? Where's he at?" Jackson looked around.

"Right here!" Jake uncovered you by moving his hand out of the way.

You waved awkwardly at your new giant brother before he said...

info.description:
Hello and welcome to my first interactive story.

This interactive is a collection of different micro stories you can explore and add too. The general plot of this story is the main character is a inch tall male who goes through different stories based on what choice you pick. The choices will range from different drafts to multiple media such as TV, Games, Anime, and Cartoons.

The stories created can go in multiple directions. One story can be for fetish purposes or you can make a legitimate story.

The choice of story will be a choice and after clicking you will see a summary of what this story is and the choices to click on.

(Note: Added 8/25/18)
▪when I write chapters, I mostly see them from a anime perspective. Meaning even if I write for non anime characters and even real life humans, I visualized them as anime. So just a head up for when I write chapters and they seem anime like.

Rules:
- Only male interaction. There are many other stories with females but here, keep the interactions to male.
- Fetishes such as Feet, Vore, and Worship are allowed. However please refrain from scat and piss.
- On some of these choices there will be a age option. This is for the purpose of how the story will go, if you pick a young age it is meant to be a legit story. Do not use the underage option for any fetishes.
- If you add a choice please try to add to it. And if you do please add at least a paragraph.

Read on and enjoy!
